Package persistance

Contains classes that access the program's data sources
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ConfigDAO
    Interface used for accessing the user's configuration
    PlaylistDAO
    Interface used for accessing the user's configuration
    SongDAO
    Interface used for accessing the songs
    StatisticsDAO
    Interface used for getting data to generate statistics from and adding song plays
    UserDAO
    Interface used for accessing the users
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Config
    Reads the config.json uses it's values to configure the app
    ConfigDDBBDAO
    Class that manages database operations regarding a user's configuration
    DDBBAccess
    Establishes a connection with the database specified in connect()
    PlaylistDDBBDAO
    Class that manages database operations regarding a user's configuration
    SongDDBBDAO
    Class that manages database operations regarding songs
    StatisticsDDBBDAO
    Class that manages database operations regarding song plays and statistics creation
    UserDDBBDAO
    Class that manages database operations regarding registered and virtual users
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    OutOfConnectionsException
    Thrown when a connection is requested and no more are available
